sentence.Network_en: Oh, he was the noblest man that ever was.
sentence.Network_cn: 欧, 他真了不起.我从来没见过这样高尚的人.

sentence.Network_en: All that's best and noblest in me loves you.
sentence.Network_cn: 我这个人所有最优美、最高尚的那一部分,全都是爱你的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 柏拉图在《理想国》中有多处谈论哲学和哲学家,他称哲学是最高贵的(noblest)学问,是神物(497C),哲学家是智慧的爱好者,他们不是仅爱智慧的一部分,而是爱它的.
Such altruistic behavior is one of the noblest attributes of our species ., 这样的利他行为是我们人类最高贵的品质之一.
the noblest vengeance is to forgive ., 宽恕是最高尚的报复.
i have only ever embraced that oldest and noblest of pirate traditions ., 我只是遵从了最古老最尊贵的海盗传统.

list.abs: love is noblest frailty of mind .爱情是心灵最高尚的弱点。
elegant taste , noblest character , with sidekicks letter paper , new type of plastic clip , complete function .典雅韵味，高贵品质；附有插袋、便用笺、新型塑料夹，功能齐全。
this beauty is so precious , and so congenial to our tenderest and noblest feelings ,这样的美是如此珍贵，也如此适合我们最温柔与最高尚的情感，
in London , the noblest lords and ladies take pleasure in doing him honor .在伦敦，最高贵的贵族和夫人们都愿意尊重他。

entry.def: If you say that someone is a noble person, you admire and respect them because they are unselfish and morally good.

example.ex: He was an upright and noble man who was always willing to help in any way he could...
example.tran: 他是一个正直高尚的人，总是愿意尽其所能帮助他人。

example.ex: I wanted so much to believe he was pure and noble.
example.tran: 我非常愿意相信他是纯洁高尚的。

entry.tran: (想法、目标、行动等)高尚的,崇高的
entry.def: If you say that something is a noble idea, goal, or action, you admire it because it is based on high moral principles.

example.ex: He had implicit faith in the noble intentions of the Emperor...
example.tran: 他对皇帝陛下高尚的动机深信不疑。

example.ex: We'll always justify our actions with noble sounding theories...
example.tran: 我们总会用听起来非常高尚的理论为我们的行动辩护。

entry.tran: 壮观的;宏伟的;卓越的;优质的
entry.def: If you describe something as noble, you think that its appearance or quality is very impressive, making it superior to other things of its type.

example.ex: ...the great parks with their noble trees.

entry.def: Noble means belonging to a high social class and having a title.

example.ex: Although he was of noble birth he lived as a poor man.
example.tran: 虽然他出身贵族，却过着穷人的日子。

entry.def: In former times, people who belonged to a high social class and had titles such as 'Baron' or 'Duke' were referred to as nobles .

example.ex: More and more nobles made Moscow their home during Catherine's reign.
example.tran: 在叶卡捷琳娜大帝统治时期，越来越多的贵族移居莫斯科。

auth_sentence.content: Odd...how often the noblest girls had these deplorable brothers.
auth_sentence.res_content: Odd...how often the noblest girls had these deplorable brothers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Odd...how often the noblest girls had these deplorable brothers.

auth_sentence.content: If not the noblest and worshipfulest of all Englishmen, at least the strongest and terriblest.
auth_sentence.res_content: If not the noblest and worshipfulest of all Englishmen, at least the strongest and terriblest.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If not the noblest and worshipfulest of all Englishmen, at least the strongest and terriblest.

auth_sentence.content: Nor could we check our sympathy, even at the urging of hard reason, without deterioration in the noblest part of our nature.
auth_sentence.res_content: Nor could we check our sympathy, even at the urging of hard reason, without deterioration in the noblest part of our nature.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nor could we check our sympathy, even at the urging of hard reason, without deterioration in the noblest part of our nature.
